name: Nova Islands
description:
What if you were given an island on another planet?

Would you be able to survive and thrive?

  • Collect resources available on the island
  • Craft new useful technologies
  • Unlock and explore new biomes nearby
  • Configure your bots to make all that twice as fast!
CONTROLS

The game is played with Mouse & Keyboard. All controls are explained in game.

FAQ

Q. Is the game single-player only?

- Yes

Q. Are you going to add controller support?

- Yes, eventually, not sure when. It's a bit trickier than it seems.

Q. How much will Nova Islands cost? Is it going to be free?

- The game will not be free but we don't have a final price yet.

Q. What are you making Nova Islands in?

- We're using Unity for the development and Photoshop for the pixel art.

Q. Who's working on Nova Islands?

BEHEMUTT is a team of 2 passionate developers.

We hope you'll love it but don't hold back on your critics!
